#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int n1,n2;
string s1,s2;
int tc;
int vis[1002][1002];
int dp[1002][1002];

int f(int idx1, int idx2)
{
    if ( idx1 == n1 || idx2 == n2 ) return 0;
    if ( vis[idx1][idx2] == tc ) return dp[idx1][idx2];
    vis[idx1][idx2] = tc;
    int ans = max(f(idx1+1,idx2), f(idx1,idx2+1));
    if ( s1[idx1] == s2[idx2] ) ans = max(ans, 1 + f(idx1+1, idx2+1));
    dp[idx1][idx2] = ans;
    return ans;
}
int main()
{
    int t,ans;
    cin >> t;
    for ( tc = 1; tc <= t; tc++ ) {
        cin >> n1 >> n2;
        cin >> s1 >> s2;
        ans = n1 + n2 - f(0,0);
        cout << "Case " << tc << ": " << ans << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
